   Joshua Gillin
   By Joshua Gillin September 14, 2016

Patrick Murphy has voted against 'every' Zika funding bill, Marco Rubio says

   While the Senate bickers over Zika funding, U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio’s
   campaign says Democratic challenger U.S. Rep. Patrick Murphy has been
   playing partisan politics over the issue in the House.

"Patrick Murphy is the only candidate to have voted against every measure
   to fund Zika," she said on Sept. 7, 2016.
